item.description:
Alright! It's finally summer and the pool is open! SIX FLAGS! SIX FLAGS o' FUN for your little dog and friends. Come on over and let them get muddy. Stay and sip something cool while they dry off. Same time, same place. Sure hope to see you all there. Meeting fee is optional. I have no idea what we will have to eat or drink. Bring your favorite stuff.

Thanks!!

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: There's a new sign for the front of the house. Check my website for directions: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, the company is friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs June Meeting
